Title: Indian Oil seeks 12 LNG cargoes for delivery to Dhamra in 2024
Description: State-owned oil refiner Indian Oil seeks 12 cargoes for delivery to the 5 mtpa Dhamra LNG terminal in Indiaâ€™s state of Odisha next year through a tender that closes on Aug. 8. One cargo a month is to be delivered to the terminal.
Author: CK

Title: US June LNG exports to Asia rise to highest levels since November 2021
Description: LNG exports from the US continued to slip for a second consecutive month in June after hitting a peak in April, but shipments to Asia rose to their highest levels in 19 months as LNG prices continued to stay at a premium for deliveries to Asia compared to Europe.
Author: CK
